html:
April 6 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Catalana Occidente, Gulf Keystone Petroleum and Santander, on Tuesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Catalana Occidente GCO.MC: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* Gulf Keystone Petroleum Ltd GKP.L: Berenberg cuts to hold from buy

* Harbour Energy Plc HBR.L: Peel Hunt raises to hold from reduce

* Mapfre MAP.MC: JP Morgan raises to overweight from underweight

* Santander SAN.MC: Credit Suisse raises to outperform from neutral


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Tuesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* Aallon Group Oyj AALLON.HE: Inderes raises PT to EUR 12.5 from EUR 12.0; rating increase

* ABB Ltd ABBN.S: Goldman Sachs reinstates with buy rating and target price CHF 35

* Adevinta ASA ADEV.OL: UBS cuts price target to NOK 140 from NOK 150

* Admicom Oyj ADMCM.HE: Inderes cuts to reduce from increase; PT to EUR 95 from EUR 100

* Adux SA ADUX.PA: Portzamparc raises to accumulate from hold; target price EUR 2.30

* Airtel Africa AAF.L: HSBC raises target price to 80.49p from 75.97p

* At & S ATSV.VI: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 40 from EUR 36

* Atari SA ATAR.PA: Midcap Partners puts target under review (vs. EUR 0.7); rating buy

* Atlas Copco AB ATCOa.ST: Barclays raises price target to SEK 500 from SEK 420

* Atos ATOS.PA: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy, cuts target to EUR 57 from EUR 85

* Atos ATOS.PA: HSBC cuts target price to EUR 68 from EUR 85

* Atos ATOS.PA: HSBC cuts to hold from buy
